Ability Description: on die: deals 2 more damage to the enemy card or hero if dies
description for developers: (for developers: dying only happens when attacking or defending, in both scenarios there is another enemy card interacting with this card, if this card dies during the fight, the enemy card gets 2 more damages)

Ability Description: ongoing: gives +1 damage to the cards in the same layer
on attack: if fights an enemy card deals damage to all the cards in that layer
ongoing: if passes through mana layer generates 2 mana
description for developers: in each attack, if passes through mana layer, generates 2 mana instead of 1, normal cards generate 1
